name: Beat'n'Path
description:
Connect colorful shapes in this simple, but difficult puzzle game!

How to Win

Collect Shapes in the Sequence shown at the top, and return to the Start (at the bottom of the screen).

How to Play
  1. Using your mouse, drag and drop the white circles to connect Shapes.
  2. Drag the orange handes to move and rotate Shapes.
  3. Right-click a track to remove it.
  4. Left-click a track to give it priority.
  5. Press the 'play' button, at the top right, to test your solution.
Special Shapes
  1. White square: Switches priority for all tracks.
  2. Red pentagon: Bounces the player back.
  3. White triangle: Switches priority for all tracks, but only when crossing it in the direction it's pointing.
